body.p:
Springfield Ky
Feb 22 1865
His Excellency
Gov. T. E Bramlette

Dear sir, your conversation with the neighbors of the two young Farris now in the penitentiary upon the charge of horse stealing from this county. I am satisfied they present a good claim for executive clemency, I am informed they have been in confinement now about a year & they are young, and their neighbors generally express a desire for their release
